title: Scaramdar
content:
Scaramdar is a boss monster slain during the Forgotten Things quest.


 * To aid in killing this boss, you can hide behind the chest (positioned to the left) as a safespot to heal up.
 * You regenerate health passively so no potions are actually required.
 * The boss walks around the area in random paths and you can wait until he is close to the safespot before initiating the battle (closer between safespot and boss makes it easier).
